languages.text: Расчет урона от атак дистанционным и рукопашным оружием, а также других {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, рассчитывается одинаково. Он складывается из нескольких показателей. На урон, который персонаж наносит противникам, влияют параметры используемого оружия, способности персонажа, а также действия эффектов. Показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} цели позволяет снизить входящий урон на указанное значение. При этом показатель {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавления отражения{/g}, который есть у оружия атакующего, уменьшает отражение цели. Значение урона, получившееся с учетом всех этих параметров, уменьшается на процент {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} цели (если у цели броня равна 56, урон будет уменьшен на 56%), но этот процент также может быть снижен параметром {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}.
languages.original_text: The damage received from the attacks with ranged or melee weapons, as well as other abilities, is calculated in the same way. It consists of several parameters. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the characteristics of the weapon used, the character's abilities, as well as active effects. Target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflection{/g} directly reduce received damage by its value, but Deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Deflection Negation{/g}. This value is reduced by target's {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}Armour{/g} applied as percentage (for example, if target has Armour 56, the damage will be reduced by 56%), but Armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Armour Penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Расчет урона от атак дальнобойным и рукопашным оружием, а также других способностей, рассчитывается одинаково. Он складывается из нескольких параметров.
На урон, который наносит персонаж противникам, влияют характеристики используемого оружия, способности персонажа, а также действия эффектов. Показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} цели позволяет снизить входящий урон на указанное значение. При этом показатель {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавления отражения{/g}, который есть у оружия атакующего, уменьшает отражение цели.
Значение урона, получившееся с учетом всех этих параметров, уменьшается на процент {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}брони{/g} цели (если у цели броня равна 56, урон будет уменьшен на 56%), но этот процент также может быть снижен параметром {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}.

Расчет урона от атак дальнобойным и рукопашным оружием, а также других способностей, рассчитывается одинаково. Он складывается из нескольких параметров.
На урон, который наносит персонаж противникам, влияют характеристики используемого оружия, способности персонажа, а также действия эффектов. Показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} цели позволяет снизить входящий урон на указанное значение. При этом показатель {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавления отражения{/g}, который есть у оружия атакующего, уменьшает отражение цели.
Значение урона, получившееся с учетом всех этих параметров, уменьшается на процент {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}брони{/g} цели (если у цели броня равна 56, урон будет уменьшен на 56%), но этот процент также может быть снижен параметром {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}.

languages.text: The damage received from attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons as well as from other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
languages.original_text: Расчет урона от атак дистанционным и рукопашным оружием, а также других {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, рассчитывается одинаково. Он складывается из нескольких показателей. На урон, который персонаж наносит противникам, влияют параметры используемого оружия, способности персонажа, а также действия эффектов. Показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} цели позволяет снизить входящий урон на указанное значение. При этом показатель {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавления отражения{/g}, который есть у оружия атакующего, уменьшает отражение цели. Значение урона, получившееся с учетом всех этих параметров, уменьшается на процент {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} цели (если у цели броня равна 56, урон будет уменьшен на 56%), но этот процент также может быть снижен параметром {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The damage received from attacks with ranged or melee weapons as well as from other abilities is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

The damage received from attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons as well as from other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

The damage received from attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons as well as from other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

languages.text: Der Schaden, der durch Angriffe mit {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g} sowie durch andere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} entsteht, wird auf dieselbe Weise berechnet. Dabei gibt es mehrere Faktoren. Der Schaden, den ein Charakter anrichtet, wird von den Parametern der verwendeten Waffe, den Fähigkeiten des Charakters und auch von aktiven Effekten beeinflusst. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} des Ziels reduziert den erhaltenen Schaden direkt um ihren Wert, aber Ablenkung kann durch {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Ablenkungsnegierung{/g} reduziert werden. Der Schaden wird auch durch die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels als pauschaler Prozentsatz reduziert (wenn das Ziel zum Beispiel 56 Rüstung hat, wird der eingehende Schaden um 56 % reduziert), aber Rüstung kann auch durch {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} reduziert werden.
languages.original_text: The damage received from attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons as well as from other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Schaden, der durch Angriffe mit {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf-{/g} oder Nahkampfwaffen sowie durch andere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} entsteht, wird auf dieselbe Weise berechnet. Dabei gibt es mehrere Faktoren. Der Schaden, den ein Charakter anrichtet, wird von den Parametern der verwendeten Waffe, den Fähigkeiten des Charakters und auch von aktiven Effekten beeinflusst. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} des Ziels reduziert den erhaltenen Schaden direkt um ihren Wert, aber Deflektion kann durch {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Deflektionsnegierung{/g} reduziert werden. Der Schaden wird auch durch die {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels als pauschaler Prozentsatz reduziert (wenn das Ziel zum Beispiel 56 Rüstung hat, wird der eingehende Schaden um 56 % reduziert), aber Rüstung kann auch durch {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} reduziert werden.

languages.text: Les dégâts infligés par des armes à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, ainsi que lors de l'utilisation d'autres {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, sont calculés de la même manière. Plusieurs facteurs entrent en ligne de compte. Les dégâts infligés par un personnage dépendent des paramètres de l'arme utilisée, des capacités du personnage et des effets actifs. La {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de la cible réduit les dégâts subis à hauteur de sa valeur, mais la déflexion peut être réduite par la {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}négation de déflexion{/g}. Les dégâts sont également réduits par l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible, appliquée sous forme de pourcentage fixe (par exemple, si la cible dispose de 56 d'armure, les dégâts infligés sont réduits de 56 %), mais l'armure peut également être réduite par la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.
languages.original_text: The damage received from attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons as well as from other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les dégâts subis lors d'attaques à l'aide d'armes à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g} ou de mêlée, ainsi que lors de l'utilisation d'autres {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, sont calculés de la même manière. Plusieurs facteurs entrent en ligne de compte. Les dégâts infligés par un personnage dépendent des paramètres de l'arme utilisée, des capacités du personnage et des effets actifs. La {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de la cible réduit les dégâts subis à hauteur de sa valeur, mais la déflexion peut être réduite par la {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}négation de déflexion{/g}. Les dégâts sont également réduits par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de la cible appliquée sous forme de pourcentage fixe (par exemple, si la cible dispose de 56 d'armure, les dégâts infligés sont réduits de 56 %), mais l'armure peut également être réduite par la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.

languages.text: 所有攻击造成的伤害，无论是{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器，还是特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，计算方式都完全相同。攻击造成的伤害取决于多个因素。 角色造成的伤害取决于武器属性、角色能力，以及各种伤害相关效果。目标的偏转会降低受到的伤害，但目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}会受到攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}偏转穿透{/g}的影响。 目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}同样会降低受到的伤害。举个例子，如果目标有56点护甲，则目标受到的伤害会降低56%。但同样，目标的护甲会受到攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}的影响。
languages.original_text: The damage received from attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons as well as from other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 所有攻击造成的伤害，无论是远程武器、近战武器，还是特殊能力，计算方式都完全相同。攻击造成的伤害取决于多个因素。 角色造成的伤害取决于武器属性、角色能力，以及各种伤害相关效果。目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}会降低受到的伤害，但目标的偏转会受到攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}偏转穿透{/g}的影响。 目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}护甲{/g}同样会降低受到的伤害。举个例子，如果目标有56点护甲，则目标受到的伤害会降低56%。但同样，目标的护甲会受到攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}的影响。

languages.text: El daño de los ataques con armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} se calcula de la misma forma, al igual que el de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}. Influyen distintos factores en el cálculo. El daño que inflige un personaje depende de los parámetros del arma que utilice, de sus capacidades y de los efectos activos. El {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del objetivo resta directamente su valor al daño recibido, pero el desvío se puede reducir con la {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}negación de desvío{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo también reduce el daño porcentualmente (es decir, que si el objetivo tiene 56 de armadura, reducirá el daño en un 56 %), pero también se puede limitar la efectividad de la armadura con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.
languages.original_text: The damage received from attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons as well as from other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El daño de los ataques con armas cuerpo a cuerpo o a distancia se calcula de la misma forma, al igual que el de las capacidades. Influyen distintos factores en el cálculo. El daño que inflige un personaje depende de los parámetros del arma que utilice, de sus capacidades y de los efectos activos. El {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del objetivo resta directamente su valor al daño recibido, pero el desvío se puede reducir con la {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}negación de desvío{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}armadura{/g} del objetivo también reduce el daño porcentualmente (es decir, que si el objetivo tiene 56 de armadura, reducirá el daño en un 56 %), pero también se puede limitar la efectividad de la armadura con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.

languages.original_text: The damage received from attacks with ranged or melee weapons as well as from other abilities is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器によるダメージおよびその他{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によるダメージも同様に計算する。いくつかの要素が関わってくる。 キャラクターが受けるダメージは使用武器のパラメータ、キャラクターのアビリティ、および発動している効果の影響を受ける。ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}はその値に応じて受けたダメージを直接軽減するが、ディフレクションは{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}ディフレクション無効化{/g}により減少することがある。 ダメージは一律に適用されるターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}値に応じて軽減される（例えば、ターゲットのアーマー値が56の場合、受けるダメージは56％減少する）が、アーマー値は{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}により減少することがある。
languages.original_text: The damage received from attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons as well as from other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 遠距離または近接武器によるダメージおよびその他アビリティによるダメージも同様に計算する。いくつかの要素が関わってくる。 キャラクターが受けるダメージは使用武器のパラメータ、キャラクターのアビリティ、および発動している効果の影響を受ける。ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}はその値に応じて受けたダメージを直接軽減するが、ディフレクションは{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}ディフレクション無効化{/g}により減少することがある。 ダメージは一律に適用されるターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}アーマー{/g}値に応じて軽減される（例えば、ターゲットのアーマー値が56の場合、受けるダメージは56％減少する）が、アーマー値は{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}により減少することがある。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Menzilli{/g} silahlar ile {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahlarının yanı sıra diğer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerden{/g} alınan hasar da aynı şekilde hesaplanır. Hesaplamada çeşitli faktörler söz konusudur. Bir karakterin verdiği hasar; kullandığı silahın parametrelerinden, karakterin kabiliyetlerinden ve de aktif etkilerden etkilenir. Hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri, alacağı hasarı doğrudan azaltır ancak saptırma değeri de {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}saptırma yadsıması{/g} ile azaltılabilir. Hasar ayrıca hedefin yüzdeye çevrilen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değeri tarafından da azaltılır (örneğin hedefin 56 puan zırhı varsa gelen hasar %56 düşer) ancak zırh değeri de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} tarafından düşürülebilir.
languages.original_text: The damage received from attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons as well as from other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is calculated in the same way. There are several factors involved. The damage that a character inflicts is affected by the parameters of the weapon used, the character's abilities, and also active effects. The target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} directly reduces received damage by its value, but deflection can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g}. Damage is also reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} applied as a flat percentage (for example, if the target has 56 armour, incoming damage will be reduced by 56%), but armour also can be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
